commonOptionSysDescr.message:
System prompt used by the model.
Use #PAGE_TEXT_CONTENT# as the placeholder to be replaced by the content of the page.

commonOptionSysDefault.message: You are an in-browser assistant helping a user interact with a web page. Here is the page content #PAGE_TEXT_CONTENT#

ollamaConfigEndpointError.message: Value should be a valid URL!

ollamaConfigModelError.message: Value should be in the <model>:<tag> format
